title.narrative: 7 Governance and Democratic Participation Programme

description.narrative: This is a five-year, multi-stakeholder programme that aims to support the country sustain efforts towards strengthening institutional capacities and frameworks for strengthening good governance and deepening democratic participation.

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.3.1.2.1

description.narrative: Country has requested the application of tools such as the UNDG conflict and development analysis (CDAs) to inform planning and programming in key sectors

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.3.3.1

description.narrative: Country has strengthened capacities for governance and oversight of rule of law institutions

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.3.1.B

description.narrative: Country has strengthened institutions and systems supporting fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations Human rights

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.3.1.A

description.narrative: Country has strengthened institutions and systems supporting fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations Rule of law and justice

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.2.1.3.1

description.narrative: Country is supported by UNDP, upon request, to establish or strengthen national infrastructures for peace

title.narrative: Output Indicator 3.2.1.3.1

description.narrative: Country is supported by UNDP, upon request, to establish or strengthen national infrastructures for peace

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.1.1.1

description.narrative: National and sub-national governments have improved capacities to plan, budget, manage and monitor basic services

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.1.1

description.narrative: Number of Electoral Management Bodies (EMBs) with strengthened capacity to conduct inclusive, effective and accountable elections

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.3.1

description.narrative: Parliament has improved capacities to undertake inclusive, effective and accountable law-making

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.2.C

description.narrative: Women's participation in elections: Country has implemented Temporary Special Measures (TSMs) to ensure women’s participation and representation.
